channel.title: The TRUE Kleiner
channel.description:
Well, I just got really excited about BM. Maybe it's the summer, but I decided to look at the FAQ. I saw that in BM, the scientist that Eli was afraid to move was Kleiner, which I know is wrong. 1. If you saw your former student, wouldn't greet him pretty friendly? Yes you would, you wouldn't just say "Greetings." 2. The true Kleiner is most likely the scientist you meet at the end at the Lambda core, the one with Barney and the Long-jump Module. I say this because this Scientist is holding a shotgun, which is mirrored in HL2 after arriving from Nova Prospect.
Those are why I think the scientist at the Lambda core should be Kleiner in BM, not the other one. Thoughts?

Oh wait you’re from Texas, never mind.

And wow. Didn’t think me living in Texas would make this thread turn into Jokes about Texas…I’m not offended though, please continue…

item.title: The TRUE Kleiner
item.dc:creator: Chaotic
item.description:
OKAY OKAY EVERYONE IVE GOT IT!

The two hgrunts that throw you into the trash compactor are Kleiner and Eli!!!

You see, hgrunts are just babyheadcrabzombies and these babyheadcrabzombies arent very strong and need masks and suits of armor to live, but are very easily over powered afrter 2-3 hours. so Kleiner and Eli were still being controlled by the said babyheadcrabzombies. <-------------BEST THEERY EVAAHHHHH!!! lol

Read full topic

item.title: The TRUE Kleiner
item.dc:creator: Apollomasque
item.description:
I can’t get the idea of a young groovy Eli out of my head. Back in the 70’s or something. He jazz-walks up to his Administator with a massive afro and bellbottoms, a gold chain on overtop his labcoat.
“Check it, the harmonic frequencies are sincing up perfectly, we got a successful sympathetic field around the module. BOYYYYYYYYYY!”

I’m so afraid of offending someone with this.

Read full topic

item.title: The TRUE Kleiner
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
Yeah, that’s bad but I’m for a timer, make’s it more serious and could make at least one noob read it.
Or better, every new member can only access the faq thread first. In this case if they want to troll, it’s on purpose and they’ve got no excuses.

Read full topic

item.title: The TRUE Kleiner
item.dc:creator: Skaevola
item.description:
They still wouldn’t do it. Forum faqs are like end-user license agreements: you can put all the locks, timers and links you want, but no one will ever read it, and douchebags will be douchebags.

Read full topic

item.title: The TRUE Kleiner

It would solve all non-troll/spam problems.
EDIT: Nothing against you in particular, Gurluas, just new members in general don’t read it/ignore it. Welcome to the forums!
